Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION EvaluatePermissionExplicitDefine ( @type VARCHAR(32), @propdef_id CHAR(32), @itemtype_id CHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT MAX (CASE WHEN ( (acs.can_define_explicitly = '1' OR define_permission_behavior = N'no_check') AND @type = 'can_define_explicitly' ) THEN 9 -- can_update permissions only WHEN ( (acs.can_undefine_explicitly = '1' OR define_permission_behavior = N'no_check') AND @type = 'can_undefine_explicitly' ) THEN 9 -- can_delete permissions only WHEN ( (acs.can_get_isdefined_explicitly = '1' OR define_permission_behavior = N'no_check') AND @type = 'can_get_isdefined_explicitly' ) THEN 9 -- can_change_access permissions only ELSE 0 -- No permissions on specified for specified access right END) p FROM (SELECT acs.CAN_DEFINE_EXPLICITLY, acs.CAN_UNDEFINE_EXPLICITLY, acs.CAN_GET_ISDEFINED_EXPLICITLY, define_permission_behavior FROM [ITEMTYPE_XPROPERTYDEFINITION] as it_xpd LEFT OUTER JOIN [ACCESS_EXPLICITDEFINE] acs ON it_xpd.define_permission_behavior <> N'no_check' AND acs.SOURCE_ID = it_xpd.define_permission_id WHERE it_xpd.[related_id] = @propdef_id AND it_xpd.[source_id] = @itemtype_id AND (it_xpd.define_permission_behavior = N'no_check' OR CHARINDEX(acs.[related_id] COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, @identity_list) > 0) ) acs )
Item.name: EvaluatePermissionExplicitDefine
